channel.title: CVE Feed for Ivanti -- DSM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ivanti -- DSM

item.title: CVE-2024-29213|2024-10-21T17:16:00.310Z -- ivanti -- dsm
item.description: Ivanti DSM < version 2024.2 allows authenticated users on the local machine to run code with elevated privileges due to insecure ACL via unspecified attack vector.
